text:
[Ethan] Two days ago, we filmed a response to Zarna,
A.K.A. the Hugh Mungus lady.

And, as a little bit of a meme,
we gave her $100 to test her moral fiber,
to see if she was willing to take our patriarchy money, and in doing so, maybe becoming part of the patriarchy.
I wanted to see how she could justify that.
And, well, she's pretty much responded.
She took our donations, and she fuckin'-- I don't know why this feature exists on YouCaring,
but you can hide the amount and the name.
So she's like, "I'll take your money, I'm just gonna fucking silence you as much as I can".

Name erased, message erased.
Isn't that wonderful?

Look at this scorched earth shit.
Eight pages of fuckin' graveyard.
[Zarna] It's called "internalized oppression".
[Zarna] HOW DARE YOU, YOU DISGUSTING PERSON!

[Ethan] Yes, Zarna, you can't dispute it anymore.
You've got our money in your pocket!
You took it and said "Thank you, I don't wanna hear it but I WILL take your money."

You're part of the patriarchy now,
and you're part of the problem.
[INTERNALIZED OPPRESSION]
It's her right, but I think it says a lot about her movement, her intellect, and her capacity to defend herself,
and her blatant hypocrisy, so...
Congratulations, everyone, on indoctrinating Zarna. She is a part of the patriarchy now and we welcome you!
Please enjoy our money.
You see, it's a little fucking goofy that we're giving her money as a meme,
when the real Rudy is fallen on some hard times.
This is a man who has been...just-- This woman is trying to ruin his life.
She is showing his face and calling him a sexual harasser.
[Zarna] The man who sexually harassed me, HE was hostile.
[Ethan] That's pretty much defamation.
If there's people who don't know the story and just see this and see him on the street,
they're gonna be like "Fuck you, rapist!"
"Good luck getting a job, good luck trying to earn a living, Hugh."

Besides that, while Zarna's out there disrupting
public places and harassing people in real life,
trying to raise money,
Rudy is going through fucking cancer treatment.
I spoke to him today, he's having a lot of health problems,

he's been going all around town
fucking trying to sling this Free Willy
Apparently, I've been seeing pictures of him in this fucking whale all over the internet.
Apparently, locally in Seattle, this guy is such a character,
driving around trying to sling this fucking fake willy whale
but I think what most people don't realize is that even though he looks wonderful and lovely and beautiful,
and I do love the beard, Rudy, I think keep the beard,
he's having a lot of health problems and a lot of problems in life.
I spoke to him this morning. His truck is broken down, he's a gardener by trade but he's had a hip replacement,
so he's been unable to work.
And when he had the opportunity to ask four million people, in an interview,
for money to help himself, he didn't. Not like Zarna.

So I opened a page, YouCaring,
for ya boi, papa bless, Hugh Mungus.
Now I can see that Zarna here, is at $875 already out of her $1000 goal,
and I already gave Rudy $500, but I feel like we need to start him off right!
We need to give him another $376, I think,
just to make sure he's got $1 more than Zarna,
because, YES, I am that petty!
And yes, I did give her $100, and I'm like "why am I giving $100 to Zarna as a goof,
and I didn't even help fuckin' Hugh Mungus at all, who actually really needs it?"
And I think, together, we can fuckin' free that fake ass willy out of his truck,
get him chillin' at home, gettin' medical treatment.
Take care of ya boy Hugh Mungus, who deserves it,

and then, get him in the White House!
Hugh Mungus Bone for president, where he belongs!

So please join me, by
clicking the link in the description, YouCaring
Papa bless Hugh Mungus! Can we please get this man a fuckin' little help? Okay?

God damn, he's helped so many people already
just with what he's done and with Hope Soldiers
Let's help out the man himself, dude, he needs it now!

And he's got, he's such
a great guy, he wouldn't even ask.
I called him and I said "Hey, what's up with you? How are you doing?", just checking in with him,
and he goes "Man, I'll tell you what, dude, I'm not good."
He's a fucking humble guy, and he's out there and he's suffering.
He wouldn't even ask for help.
And when I tell him I'm gonna make a YouCaring for him,

He goes, "Listen, I'm just gonna donate everything,
I don't use immediately to-'
I'm like, "Dawg, stop. It's your money, Hugh Mungus. You keep it, take care of yourself,
and free that fake ass free willy, k?
Just throw it in the ocean, dude, it's not your trouble anymore.
Just take that out of your truck,

I don't know man, just...we just
want you to be healthy and happy, dawg"

And just remember, every dollar you give
helps smash that motherfucking patriarchy.
Just remember that as we goof on people, it doesn't necessarily mean that we hate them.

I think one of the most important things 
we can take into the world

is a tenderness and a compassion
for those we may dislike or even hate.

And one more footnote...that Zarna
does not represent feminism.
I think what she represents is the cult of outrage,
it's a bastardization,
it's like, it's like saying an orc is an elf, okay?

And those of you who are familiar
with Lord of the Rings lore,
know that the Orcs were buried and bastardized by dark magic and turned into a completely different race.

So to say that Zarna represents feminism, 
is like saying that an Orc is an Elf,
and anyone there who's read Lord of the Rings, knows that that's not the same thing.

Let's focus our love and
our affection on Papa Hugh Mungus.

The man, he needs help,
and god dammit, we're all here to fucking...
We got his back, alright?
So...

Thank you guys, papa bless, and uh,
we appreciate y'all so much.
See ya next time.
